title: How to Flirt With Another Guy (For Guys)

steps.title: Use any flirtatious manner that comes naturally to you.
steps.content: Use any flirtatious manner that comes naturally to you. You like to tell a joke, announce your first name and ask them what it is, or give them a praise along with your name. Some scenarios necessitate flexibility; pay attention to the guy's mood and general manner before approaching him.

steps.title: This is to see if you have similar interests.
steps.content: This is to see if you have similar interests. Many people have a wide range of interests, from the mundane to the bizarre. It is critical to pay attention to the other person and to speak honestly.

steps.title: You should be able to tell whether or not the other person is interested in you at this time.
steps.content: You should be able to tell whether or not the other person is interested in you at this time. Don't start off too strong.

steps.title: Keep in mind that some men aren't gay and are uncomfortable with flirting.
steps.content: Keep in mind that some men aren't gay and are uncomfortable with flirting. If that is the case, back off and look for someone who is. If the wrong man is straight, flirting or hitting on him can be dangerous. If a gay man "hits" on them, there are a lot of men who regard it as a threat to their sexuality. Just be cautious and back off if he doesn't exhibit an almost immediate interest.
